title: Graphic Novel Font
content:
Hi Folks — I'm looking for a classic comic book/graphic novel font for speech and captioning. Can anyone help?

Thanks

El.
author: Eluard

comments.content:
Hi Eluard,

[Blambot.com: Comic Fonts and Lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419031138/http:/www.blambot.com/)  
 [Comicraft.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419031138/http:/www.comicraft.com/)  
 [Comicbookfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419031138/http:/www.comicbookfonts.com/)  
 [Letterheadfonts \> Cartoon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419031138/http:/letterheadfonts.com/styles/cartoon.shtml)  
 [Canadatype: Caper Comic, Captain Comic, Collector Comic etc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419031138/http:/www.canadatype.com/fonts.php)  
 [Collection of alternatives to Comic Sans MS](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419031138/http:/www.bancomicsans.com/fonts.html)

See also this thread: [Comic Book Typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419031138/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36287)  
F

Many thanks JH and Florian — that is just what I needed.

cheers
